name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
description:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Geo Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Jagged Stone: Mask of Solitude Basalt
storytext: "He knew right from wrong, and he never missed his mark."
